name: Moore's Folly
description:
Moore's Folly is an cryptic horror game that combines puzzle elements with a Lovecraftian Tamagachi to create an odd atmosphere and space to explore.

Utilize the user guide provided by SOVEREIGN Corp along with the notes of the previous owner Dr. Timothy Moore to attempt to unravel the mysteries within.

Everything has a purpose and a system. Can you reach the end or will you go insane?

Game is currently Windows only.
